sentences.sentence: Pundits who want to sound judicious are fond of warning against generalizing.
sentences.translation: 那些想让自己听起来明智的专家喜欢警告不要一概而论。

sentences.sentence: Once again, press pundits said I was dead.
sentences.translation: 媒体评论家又一次声称，我死定了。

sentences.sentence: EVEN technology pundits can sometimes be right.
sentences.translation: 有时连技术专家的话也很有道理。
